resources:
RPG Party Order Assemble a new party Join a party Party name: Let friends join your party Make party Party missing name Every party needs a name.
Your friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve. Modify party name Tell your friends to join your party from the main menu. Devices will appear below. Tap devices to add them to the group. _initialized_ Network error Something prevented creation of the "listen" socket. This is required to let other devices talk to me. Without it, I cannot even start creating the party. Service registration failed I cannot create the "heroes gather here" service. There's nothing I can do about it.
(Error %1$s) Failed to get NSD Looks like the Network Service Discovery is unavailable. I require this thing to let your friends join the party. Tell your friends to join
%1$s. The party will be visible to all devices on the same network. Say something so the party owner can recognize you Start looking for a party I'm scanning the network for hero groups. Groups will appear below. Explicit connect Cannot find your group?
Try an explicit connection! Something has gone wrong with network discovery (error %1$s) Are your friends having trouble in finding your group? Here is data to use "explicit connect":
 To attempt a specific connection you need two pieces of information. They can be found at the bottom of the screen on group owner device. You might have to try this a few times. The second information you need is a port. It's the number at the bottom of the screen on group owner device. Connect Port: %1$d
 Address: %1$s
 Port Network address Service discovery error This does not look like a valid port number. Ports are usually between 1024 and 65535. Try again. Unable to connect to the specified host. Make sure you're specifying a valid host and the host is reachable ('thethering' will help). Try again. I/O error Could not connect to host. System message:
%1$s Failed to parse server reply. This server is incompatible. Server replied in an unexpected way. This server is incompatible. Version: %1$d (%2$s) Options: matching group protocol is more recent, please update this installation group protocol is obsolete, please update group owner installation Joining group To join a group, write a message to group owner. You must do that at least once. Send Wait until group owner confirms you being in the group. Device %1$d, connected from %2$s said: Tap to let in group Reject %1$d silent %2$s connected. %1$d %2$s talked, showing below. device devices Probing group owner, please wait. Gathering party "%1$s" Failed to get network information. This isn't really a problem but you'll have to find this device network address in some other way in case your friends need explicit connection data. "An error occured while attempting to start accepting connections. I suggest to start again, possibly after rebooting device." A device tried to connect to the group but something went wrong in the process. Lost connection to device managing characters %1$s. Lost connection to device, last words: %1$s Connection to server lost or closed unexpectedly. Server is running protocol %1$d but client requires %2$d.
Please update %3$s device. this party owner Cannot start network discovery. Error %1$s. Send a message to join this group. Send %1$d / %2$d "Error detected while attempting to send message to party owner. Details: " Empty messages are forbidden. Message too long. It might be displayed partially or not at all. Go back and fit the given budget. / Kick device? This device connection will be terminated. The device can still attempt to join again, this is just a temporary ban. Kick away Group member! Disconnected from a party before I could identify it. Disconnected from group %1$s (hosted at %2$s). Name Initiative Creator Character name Health points Initiative bonus Send At least one failed .writeSync calls. Could not switch to playing character definition mode. I suggest starting from scratch. Details:
%1$s Experience Defining characters Accepted! Refuse Accept Party owner just tried to redefine key for the active group. This is very odd and might result in malfunctions. You were accepted in some other group than the one you're on already. I'll just ignore this, carry on. Try to join a single group next time (in doubt, try explicit connection) Add another character Must have a name. Health points must be positive.
 Health points must be a number.
 Initiative must be a number.
 Experience must be at least 0.
 Experience points must be a number.
 Not a valid character Go back and try again. Failed to send character data to party owner, detailed error follows:
 Players can now define playing characters. They can define more than one for each device part of the group.
Their characters will appear below. Sent. Waiting reply. >
